::: Transanulas pushes past Ramulus ::: Get out of my way Maximal! This mouse 
is mine!

::: He sets her down and takes out his pistol and plants it agianst her 
temple ::: 

::: Transanulas ::: Drop your wepons, and leave now or I will kill her now!

~~~~~~~~

::: Set falls to the ground as he takes the bullets in his head. He's unable 
to talk or think clearly and stumbles out of the base and takes cover behinde 
Ra and Ominous. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast ::: Damn it! Peace talks....battles....

::: He turns and leaves for the base. He arrives and enters the bridge quite 
pissed off. :::

::: Gremlin ::: I take it that the pe-

:::: Hell Beast ::: Argh! I want the Newcomers destroyed! They runined my 
plans! Gremlin, Marine, Jackle, and Pheniox, go and finish them off. Right 
now we need to help Liono....I will be there in a moment.
